story_23_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hmm. It seems Valerie’s reputation precedes her.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Indeed. Valerie’s designs are extremely popular
with lots of people.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Hmm... By the way, how much would one
outfit cost?
story_23_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hmm... Well, from what I’ve heard from other
Trainers from Kalos...
story_23_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: a single outfit could cost more than 500 Big Pearls.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I see... I was thinking of getting an outfit for my
daughter, but...if they cost that much...
story_23_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
It’s not the price that matters. It’s how good it
looks on the wearer that’s important.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
That’s right. Clair, Koga, your outfits really match
the two of you well.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
The two of you have such a charming style. I’m
sure even your clothes are happy to be worn by
you two.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I knew you’d understand! We have the
same sensibilities.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hmm, all right! I’ve made up my mind!
Since you’ve complimented me so kindly,
I will grant you my company all day long!
story_23_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
If there’s anything you’d like to do,
just let me know.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Anything is fine, from being shown around town to
having a Pokémon battle. Anything you want.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_1800_10: That sure would be a big help.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_2000_10: I’d like to become a Pokémon.
story_23_02000/2401_0401_2400_10:
Well, I mean exactly what I said. I’d like to be
a Pokémon.
story_23_02000/2401_0402_2600_10:
Really? Oh, I’m so happy to hear that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
story_23_02000/2401_1001_2700_10:
My fashion designs are all about that feeling of
becoming a Pokémon.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_2800_10:
After receiving a sync stone,
I thought I’d be able to...
story_23_02000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Oh! I’m sorry. I was caught up in the beauty of
my sync stone for a moment.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Sorry. I completely forgot what we were talking
about before.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_3400_10:
You were talking about how you thought you’d use
a sync stone to become a Pokémon.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Ah, that’s right. So, what do you think?
Would it be possible?
story_23_02000/2401_1001_3600_10:
Hmm. So you weren’t speaking metaphorically.
I think you might’ve heard some bad information.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_3700_10:
...I’m sorry, Valerie, but you can’t become a
Pokémon by using a sync stone.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_4100_10:
Isn’t there anything else you’d like to do while
you’re on Pasio?
story_23_02000/2401_1001_4200_10: Hmm. Let me think for a minute...
story_23_02000/2401_1001_4300_10: Oh! Well, there is someone I want to meet.
story_23_02000/2401_1001_4600_10: P-please! I don’t have much money, but...
story_23_02000/2401_1001_4700_10:
We want a robe— No, please make a dress
for Elesa!
story_23_02000/2401_1001_4900_10:
Yes. Just the thought of Elesa walking down the
shining runway in the Nimbasa City Gym in one
of your dresses is spellbinding...
story_23_02000/2401_1001_5000_10:
I’ve made up my mind!
I have to have you make it!
story_23_02000/2401_1001_5100_10:
If you lose in a Pokémon battle, you have to make
it for me, OK?!
